# pinTintColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the pin head.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var pinTintColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var pinTintColor: NSColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify custom a custom color for your pin. You can also specify one of the standard pin colors.

## Related Documentation

- **greenPinColor()**: Returns the standard color for green pins.
- **purplePinColor()**: Returns the standard color for purple pins.
- **redPinColor()**: Returns the standard color for red pins.
- **Location and Maps Programming Guide**

## Getting and Setting Attributes

- **animatesDrop**: A Boolean value indicating whether the annotation view is animated onto the screen.
- **pinColor**: The color of the pin head.
